sleepsooner-fabric.duskconfig.title: Sleep Sooner Config
sleepsooner-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_enabl: Allows you to disable/enable the Sleep Sooner mod.
Allows you to disable/enable the message you receive before sleeping. You still need to click the bed twice if the current time is below 12540.
sleepsooner-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_whenS: The default time in ticks when you can sleep is ~12540. The default Sleep Sooner mod value is 12000.
sleepsooner-fabric.duskconfig.whenSleepI: When Sleep Is Possible In Ticks
